Source.Name: plzip
Source.Summary: Plzip is a massively parallel (multi-threaded) implementation of lzip
Source.Description: Plzip is a massively parallel (multi-threaded) implementation of lzip, compatible with lzip 1.4 or newer. Plzip uses the compression library lzlib.

Package.Name: plzip
Package.Summary: Plzip is a massively parallel (multi-threaded) implementation of lzip
Package.Description: Plzip is a massively parallel (multi-threaded) implementation of lzip, compatible with lzip 1.4 or newer. Plzip uses the compression library lzlib.
